tool.name: ensemble_vcf
tool.description: integrates VCF files from different SNV detection methods for ensemble calling.

param.name: min_support
param.label: Minimum number of supporting methods. If less than 1, considered as minimum fraction of methods.

param.name: sorted
param.label: Are the input VCF files sorted?

tool.help: This tool integrates the VCF files generated by different SNV detection methods in order to perform ensemble SNV calling.
